name: Holopoint: Chronicle
description: Holopoint: Chronicle is intense archery combat. Explore the once lively island while skillfully weaving your way through waves of relentless holographic enemies, all while swiftly loosing arrows toward your targets.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel i5-4590 3.3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 7 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 3.4 GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080TI DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 7 GB available space
